EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor Download … What’s Next?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Congratulations! You’ve successfully downloaded the VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor software.
To activate the solution, please take these steps:
1) First, install the appliance. If you need assistance with installation, you can refer to the installation guide <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources/documentation/>. Your default login credentials are: Username: administrator ; Password: administrator
2) Next, the setup wizard will step you through the process of requesting and installing the license key to activate Virtual Health Monitor for the term of your license.
3) The setup wizard will guide you through setting up the target configuration.
Once setup is complete, you can begin exploring VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor and seeing the value its monitoring and reporting provide for your virtual environment.
Best regards,
VMTurbo
